me anuwa eekiya, sandhiya saha sahasandhiya yanuwen aandukrama warga thunak handuna gatha haka. 1.eekiya aandukramaya rajya ye swadhipathi balaya thani madhyama aanduwak wisin kriyawata nanwima, eekiya paripalana kramaya, eekiya adhikaranaya, eekiya purawasibhawaya yanadiya pradhana lakshana we.ese wuwada eekiya aandukramayan thula palath palana aayathana walata balaya pawara di pradeshiya mattamen kriyawata nanwiya haka.
